channel.title: Homes on Brigitte Hofmeister
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Brigitte Hofmeister

item.title: about
item.description:
Biography

I am a current Ph.D. candidate at the University of Georgia. A trained computer scientist with an interest of biology, I’ve found my passion in bioinformatics. Current research focuses on epigenetics in plants. Specifically I am interested in exploring inheritance patterns in plants.

I am also very interested in Big Data visualization, particularly for biological applications. Recently, I have been creating plugins for the genome browser JBrowse. I have created plugins specifically for epigenetics research. I have also developed plugins to improve ease of use.

item.title: software
item.description:

  • DNA Methylation

  • Stranded Coverage Tracks

User Experience

  • Hierarchical Track list Checkbox
  • Screenshots
